review.reviewBody: Ordered a simple avocado roll it was delicious.  everything was great and they even included the extra condiments as requested in my order.  my food arrived in what felt like under 10 minutes.
The shrimp in dynamite roll and the tempura shrimp were raw.
Kadoya sits comfortably at the top as being the best sushi in Vancouver. Great quality, great value and more importantly, the people that run it are the best you'll ever meet.
The Sushi Pizza (Original) is phenomenal. The Crunch Gogo roll was amazing! And the Ex-Girl Friend Roll is the perfect go-to roll.

Used to love kadoya
This was not good . Gomaae was tiny, 22 bucks f   ee
